## ViewSvc type

View service type for a given adapter config

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ViewSvc<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = Svc<DefaultExtensions<TConfig>>;
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [Svc](../../lattice/svc/)<!-- -->, [DefaultExtensions](../defaultextensions/)

## Example


```typescript
import type { ViewSvc } from '@lattice/view/presets/core';
import type { DOMAdapterConfig } from '@lattice/view/adapters/dom';

const view: ViewSvc<DOMAdapterConfig> = createViewSvc(adapter, signals);
const { el, map, match, portal } = view;
```
